column1: 常用缓存控制请求头对比
column2:
| 请求头字段         | 缓存类型       | 典型值示例                 |
|--------------------|----------------|--------------------------|
| If-Modified-Since | 时间校验       | Wed, 21 Oct 2023 07:28:00 GMT |
| If-None-Match     | 内容校验       | "686897696a7c876b7e"      |

// Node.js Express设置示例
res.setHeader('Set-Cookie', [
  'session=xxxx; HttpOnly; Secure',
  'token=yyyy; SameSite=Strict'
]);

location /static {
    add_header Cache-Control "public, max-age=31536000";
    add_header ETag "$request_filename-$content_length";
    if_modified_since exact;
}

column1: 大文件分块上传头示例
column2:
PUT /upload HTTP/1.1
Content-Range: bytes 0-1048575/2097152
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Length: 1048576
